metadata.title: V2A Group — Strategic Investment Advisory & Intermediation
metadata.description: V2A Group supports institutional and private investors in their strategic projects: real estate, hospitality, renewable energy, fundraising and diversified assets.

experience.title: 45+ years of experience
experience.description: Over 45 years of cumulative experience in real estate, hospitality, premium construction and strategic investments.

global.description: An international network covering all major global strategic markets.

fullService.description: End-to-end support at every stage of your investment project.

tailored.description: Customized solutions adapted to each client's objectives and requirements, whether investor or project developer.

selectivity.description: Each project undergoes rigorous analysis. Only opportunities meeting our profitability, security and feasibility criteria are retained.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Complete and regular information on project progress. Risks and opportunities are presented objectively.

alignment.title: Interest alignment
alignment.description: V2A co-invests alongside its clients on certain operations, ensuring total alignment between the group and its partners.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: Discretion is a fundamental commitment. Rigorous internal processes ensure the absolute protection of information related to our clients and transactions.

ctaBand.title: A project, an opportunity, an ambition?

metadata.title: About — V2A Group
metadata.description: Discover the vision, mission and leadership team of V2A Group, a strategic investment advisory firm.

vision.text: V2A Group positions itself as a key player in the transactional value chain, connecting investors with the most relevant opportunities through a rigorous and selective approach.
vision.mission: Our mission is to create lasting value by identifying, structuring and supporting high-potential investment projects, while ensuring perfect alignment between the interests of all stakeholders.

valere.name: Valère Duchenne
valere.title: Co-Founder & Partner
valere.bio: With over 40 years of experience in the real estate sector, Valère Duchenne brings to the group an in-depth knowledge of markets and proven negotiation skills on complex operations. His international network, established notably in Dubai, Bahrain, Belgium and France, is a major asset for identifying investors and securing opportunities.
valere.expertiseList: Transaction negotiation and structuring|Institutional relations and strategic partnerships|International investor network (France, Belgium, Middle East)

andrew.name: Andrew Duchenne
andrew.title: Co-Founder & Partner
andrew.bio: An established entrepreneur in the Indian Ocean for four years, Andrew Duchenne leads the group's operational activities. He oversees the development of innovative hotel and real estate projects, with a specialization in premium constructions using differentiating techniques and materials. His expertise in legal structuring and tax optimization, particularly in overseas territories, maximizes investment profitability.
andrew.expertiseList: Real estate and hospitality project management|Legal structuring and tax optimization|Construction innovation and patents|Premium tourism accommodation concept development|Investor network in the Indian Ocean and France

angelo.name: Angelo Rapazzini
angelo.title: Co-Founder & Partner
angelo.bio: A certified specialist in digital marketing and communication strategy, Angelo Rapazzini drives project positioning and market analysis. His innovative and high-performing approach to digital marketing ensures optimal commercialization of assets and maximum valuation of investments. He actively contributes to developing the group's investor network in the Indian Ocean and France.
angelo.expertiseList: Market studies and competitive analyses|Positioning strategy and commercialization|Innovative digital marketing and institutional communication|Investor network in the Indian Ocean and France

selectivity.title: Selectivity
selectivity.description: We only retain projects that meet our rigorous quality and profitability criteria.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear and honest communication at every stage of the investment process.

alignment.title: Interest alignment
alignment.description: Our recommendations are guided by the common interest of all stakeholders.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: Discretion is a fundamental commitment of V2A Group. Rigorous internal verification and control processes ensure the absolute protection of information related to our clients, partners and transactions. Every piece of data is subject to strict confidentiality protocols, providing our entire ecosystem with an impeccable framework of trust.

metadata.title: Expertise — V2A Group
metadata.description: Discover V2A Group's expertise: hospitality, real estate, renewable energy, fundraising and diversified assets.

expertises.pageSubtitle: Comprehensive support for your strategic investment projects

hospitality.title: Hospitality & Tourism Accommodation
hospitality.summary: Development, acquisition and disposal of premium hospitality assets, eco-resorts and innovative accommodation concepts.
hospitality.expanded: V2A operates across the entire lifecycle of hospitality assets: identifying off-market opportunities, developing premium hotels, eco-resorts, unique accommodations and innovative concepts — through to supporting disposals and transactions. The group internally develops premium tourism accommodation concepts, currently being protected through patent filings. Our operations cover high tourism potential markets, notably French overseas territories and the Indian Ocean.

realEstate.title: Real Estate Development
realEstate.summary: Design and delivery of high-value real estate programs.
realEstate.expanded: Residential and commercial development operations, new builds and rehabilitations, with particular attention to premium segments and strategic locations. V2A provides end-to-end support for each operation, from land sourcing to delivery, including optimized legal and tax structuring.

energy.title: Renewable Energy
energy.summary: Research and support for sustainable energy projects.
energy.expanded: Development and structuring of solar photovoltaic farm projects, in partnership with specialized operators. These assets offer stable and secured long-term returns, in a high-growth sector driven by energy transition policies.

fundraising.title: Fundraising
fundraising.summary: Research and support for your financing needs.
fundraising.expanded: V2A mobilizes its network of private and institutional investors to support project developers in their financing needs. Our ability to rapidly mobilize capital, combined with targeted matchmaking between qualified investors and opportunities, ensures an effective response to each operation's needs.

assets.title: Diversified Assets
assets.summary: Support for high-potential strategic asset classes: commodities, minerals, precious metals, hydrocarbons.
assets.expanded: Depending on opportunities, V2A supports its clients on other asset classes with attractive risk/return profiles: commodities, minerals and precious metals, oil and hydrocarbons, as well as other strategic resources. The group relies on a network of specialized partners for the analysis and structuring of these operations, offering its clients access to markets usually reserved for institutional players.

process.subtitle: A structured 6-step process to ensure your project's success

identification.title: Identification
identification.description: Detection and analysis of the most relevant investment opportunities.

qualification.title: Qualification
qualification.description: Rigorous assessment of each project's viability and potential.

structuring.title: Structuring
structuring.description: Legal, financial and operational project setup.

connection.title: Connection
connection.description: Linking with partners, investors and key stakeholders.

negotiation.title: Negotiation
negotiation.description: Support in discussions and agreement finalization.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.description: Operational follow-up until full project completion.

metadata.title: Legal Notice — V2A Group
metadata.description: Legal notice for the V2A Group website.

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.content: Netlify, Inc. — 44 Montgomery Street, Suite 300, San Francisco, CA 94104, USA

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content on this website (texts, images, videos, logos, trademarks, graphic elements) is the exclusive property of Groupe V2A or its partners and is protected by French and international intellectual property laws. Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication or adaptation of all or part of the website elements is prohibited without prior written authorization.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: Groupe V2A strives to ensure the accuracy and updating of information on the website. However, it does not guarantee the completeness or accuracy of the information and reserves the right to modify content at any time without notice. Use of information available on the website is at the user's sole responsibility.

data.title: Personal Data
data.content:
In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the French Data Protection Act of January 6, 1978, users have the right to access, rectify, delete and object to the processing of their personal data. To exercise these rights: contact@v2agroup.com.

For more details, please see our Privacy Policy.

metadata.title: Privacy Policy — V2A Group
metadata.description: Privacy and personal data protection policy of V2A Group.

controller.title: 1. Data Controller Identity
controller.content:
Groupe V2A SAS, with registered office at 8 Ruelle Boulot, 97400 Saint-Denis, Réunion Island, registered with the RCS of Saint-Denis under number 101 033 694, is responsible for the processing of personal data collected on the website www.v2agroup.com.

Contact: contact@v2agroup.com

collection.title: 2. Data Collected
collection.content: The website may collect the following data: name, email address, phone number, company name, message and attachments submitted through the contact form, connection and browsing data (IP address, browser type, pages viewed, date and time of connection), and cookies.

purpose.title: 3. Processing Purposes
purpose.content: The data collected is used to: respond to contact and information requests, ensure commercial relationship follow-up, improve user experience and website navigation, and establish anonymized traffic statistics.

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis
legalBasis.content: Data processing is based on user consent (contact form), the legitimate interest of Groupe V2A (statistics, website improvement), and the execution of pre-contractual measures (information requests about opportunities).

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
retention.content: Contact form data is retained for 3 years from the last contact. Browsing data is retained for a maximum of 13 months. Cookies expire according to the duration indicated in the cookie banner.

recipients.title: 6. Data Recipients
recipients.content: The data collected is intended exclusively for Groupe V2A's internal teams. It is never sold, transferred or rented to third parties. It may be communicated to technical subcontractors (hosting provider, email service provider) in strict compliance with regulations and under contractual confidentiality guarantees.

transfers.title: 7. Transfers Outside the EU
transfers.content: When using service providers located outside the European Union, Groupe V2A ensures that appropriate safeguards are in place (European Commission standard contractual clauses or adequacy decision).

rights.title: 8. User Rights
rights.content: Under the GDPR, each user has the right to access, rectification, deletion, restriction of processing, data portability and objection to processing. These rights may be exercised by email at contact@v2agroup.com or by mail to the registered office. Groupe V2A commits to responding to any request within a maximum of 30 days. In case of disagreement, the user may file a complaint with the CNIL (French Data Protection Authority).

cookies.title: 9. Cookies
cookies.content: The website uses strictly necessary cookies for operation and, subject to consent, analytical cookies. A compliant cookie banner allows users to accept all, reject all, or customize their preferences. Refusing analytical cookies does not affect website navigation.

security.title: 10. Security
security.content: Groupe V2A implements appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction. The website is secured by HTTPS protocol.

changes.title: 11. Changes
changes.content: This policy may be updated at any time. The date of the last update is indicated at the top of this page. Users are encouraged to consult it regularly.

cookies.title: Cookie Management
cookies.description: This website uses cookies to improve your experience. You can choose to accept or reject non-essential cookies.

footer.rights: © 2026 Groupe V2A SAS — All rights reserved
